snippet: George Williams was brutally assaulted by guards at Attica Correctional Facility in upstate New York in 2011. The efforts of a stranger have since allowed him to attend barber school.
abstract: George Williams, former Attica Correctional Facility inmate savagely beaten by guards there in 2011, is set to take New York barber's license exam, completing dream nearly derailed by attack; Williams was helped by United States Army specialist Donald Huber, who was raised in Attica, NY, and who raised money for barber school tuition via online fundraising campaign, despite never having met Williams.
lead_paragraph: George Williams was brutally assaulted by guards at Attica Correctional Facility in upstate New York in 2011. The efforts of a stranger have since allowed him to attend barber school.

headline.main: A Former Inmate, Beaten but Not Broken, Gets a Chance at Renewal
headline.print_headline: Life Restyled, With the Help of Strangers
